title: Conte hails Napoli for adapting to another formation change
description: Napoli could surrender top spot in Serie A this weekend after Saturday’s 2-2 draw with Lazio, but Antonio Conte has praised his players for adapting to injury-forced formation changes. Napoli lead the Scudetto race on 56 points but could be leapfrogged by second-placed Inter, sitting two points behind, when they visit Juventus for the Derby […] The post Conte hails Napoli for adapting to another formation change appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Toulouse 0-1 Paris Saint-Germain: Fabian strikes winner for unbeaten visitors
description: Fabian Ruiz’s second-half strike secured a 1-0 win for Paris Saint-Germain at Toulouse on Saturday, extending the visitors’ unbeaten run and keeping them 10 points clear at the top of Ligue 1. The Parisiens, who have not lost in the league all season, top the table with 56 points, 10 ahead of second-placed Marseille, who […] The post Toulouse 0-1 Paris Saint-Germain: Fabian strikes winner for unbeaten visitors appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
